availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J Morgan (Trimble County Farmer and Judge)

body.p: Born on September 14, 1826 in Trimble County. Farmer and judge. Married to Mary E. Ewing on November 10, 1853. Children included William R., John F., Annie B., George R., Mary K., Augustus M., Lou A., James T., Robert L., Edwin G., Charley R., Lizzie W. and Virgil H. Elected sheriff of Trimble County from 1854-1857. Elected magistrate from 1856-1873. Began farming in 1860.

bibl.p: J.H. Battle and William Henry Perrin Kentucky: A History of the State, 6th ed. (Louisville: F.A. Battery Co., 1887).
